plugins.name: 竹记 - 创意过程记录&实时预览
plugins.description:
1. To use Bamboo Record, you need to install both plug-ins and desktop software. The software can be installed through the official website https://zj.freshart.top/
  2. Please make sure that the plug-ins and software are always on during use;
  3. If you need to use other plug-ins, it is recommended to turn on the Bamboo Record plug-in again as soon as possible after use, otherwise it cannot be recorded;
  4. Bamboo Record will record each design change when running, which can be viewed randomly, and supports exporting the design process to video;
  5. It is better to determine the width and height of the drawing board before running the plug-in. It is not recommended to modify the width and height of the drawing board during the recording process;
  6. In addition, Bamboo Record provides a free real-time preview function that supports multi-device code scanning preview (to ensure that the computer and mobile terminals are on the same local area network and are allowed to pass through the firewall).


--------------


  1. 使用竹记需同时安装插件和桌面端软件，软件可通过官网安装（中文版） https://zj.94xy.com/
  2. 使用过程中请确保插件和软件一直处于开启状态；
  3. 如需使用其它插件，建议在使用之后，尽快再次开启竹记插件，否则无法记录；
  4. 竹记运行时会记录每一次设计变更，随机可以查看，支持将设计过程导出为视频：
  5. 在运行插件前就确定好画板宽高效果更佳，不建议在记录过程中修改画板宽高；
  6. 另外竹记提供了免费的实时预览功能，支持多设备扫码预览（使用需确保电脑端和移动端处于同一局域网，并允许通过防火墙）。
plugins.tagline: Record creative footprints and capture design moments

plugins.name: scale_One-click adaptation to device screen
plugins.description:
This plug-in can help designers adapt their designs to devices of different sizes with one click.


1. Automatic layout adjustment:

Automatically adjust left and right and top and bottom layouts according to different size ratios

- Automatically detect horizontal or vertical layout direction

- Adjust element spacing and padding according to layout direction

- Maintain the overall structure and visual balance of the design


2. Intelligent size detection and customization:

- Analyze all design draft sizes on the current page

- Identify the most commonly used sizes and recommend them to users

- Built-in common device sizes (iPhone, iPad, Web, etc.)

- Support adding custom sizes, customizable names and sizes


3. One-click export:

After generating the manuscript, you can export all illustrations with one click and add size information to the name

- Automatically set export options, including size information

- Support batch export of all adapted design drafts

- Automatically include size information in file naming for easy management


该插件可以帮助设计师一键将设计稿适配到不同尺寸的设备上。


1. 自动调整布局：

根据不同的尺寸比例自动调整左右和上下布局

- 自动检测水平或垂直布局方向

- 根据布局方向调整元素间距和内边距

- 保持设计的整体结构和视觉平衡


2. 尺寸智能检测与自定义：

- 分析当前页面中的所有设计稿尺寸

- 识别最常用的尺寸并推荐给用户

- 内置常见设备尺寸（iPhone、iPad、Web等）

- 支持添加自定义尺寸，可自定义名称和尺寸大小


3. 一键导出：

生成稿件后可以一键导出所有配图并在命名中加入尺寸信息

- 自动设置导出选项，包含尺寸信息

- 支持批量导出所有适配后的设计稿

- 文件命名中自动包含尺寸信息，方便管理
plugins.tagline: Ability to scale designs to multiple sizes, and lock scaling rules for design elements

plugins.name: Line Height Fixer
plugins.description:
Line Height Fixer 是一款 自动调节行高 的插件，它能让不同字号的行高与字体本身高度相匹配，解决设计图与开发环境下的文本高度不一致的情况，帮助开发同学精准还原设计稿，简化验收流程。


✨插件特性：


  1. 选中文本图层，点击“一键修复”，即可完成行高的修复。
  2. 选中包含文本的图层，点击“一键修复”，即可完成选中图层里面所有的文本元素的行高修复。
  3. 免费！免费！


🎨即将推出的功能：


  1. 当前插件仅支持当行文本的行高自动修复，多行文本暂时不做特殊处理。
  2. （我还没想好，如果你有更好的想法欢迎随时邮件沟通


太好了！是2025！我们有救了！

新年快乐 🎄 （设计师放假去了——



Line Height Fixer is an automatic line-height adjustment plugin. It aligns the line height of text layers with the actual height of the font, solving inconsistencies between design drafts and the text heights in development environments. This helps developers accurately restore design drafts and simplifies the review process.


✨ Plugin Features:


  1. Select a text layer and click "Fix in One Click" to automatically adjust the line height.
  2. Select a layer containing text, and with just one click, all text elements within the layer will have their line heights adjusted.
  3. Free! Yes, it's completely free!


🎨 Upcoming Features:


  1. Currently, the plugin only supports automatic line-height adjustments for single-line text. Multi-line text handling is not yet implemented.
  2. (I haven’t decided what’s next—if you have better ideas, feel free to email me!)


🎉 Great news—it's 2025! We’re saved!

Happy New Year 🎄 The designer’s on holiday now—enjoy! 😄

accepted.name: 拉面
accepted.description:
Unfreelance Designer :)
I love people, products, and words.

plugins.tagline: A simple tool for precisely restoring design drafts.

Design and test custom AI experiences in Figma.


You’ve validated your approach by building AI prototypes with other tools. Now it’s time to create, iterate, and refine the experience your users need by combining real AI responses with the unique visual style that makes your product stand out.


Moonshot AI Designer helps you optimize AI experiences like:

  1. AI chatbot responses
  2. Streaming and speech
  3. Dynamic prompt-driven content
  4. And more


See your design respond to AI and test it with real user prompts before you build it. Give your moonshot the best possible chance before launch.


Learn the basics of designing custom AI experiences with Moonshot AI Designer at moonshot.app.

  3. Accessibility Focused: Designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that your color choices are both visually appealing and inclusive.


Transform your design process with the Tiiny Color Palette Generator and bring vibrant, cohesive colors to your projects with just a few clicks. Elevate your creativity and ensure consistency across all your design endeavors!

plugins.name: Hilbert
plugins.description:
Weave unique patterns with FASS curves.


FASS stands for 'space-Filling, self-Avoiding, Simple, and Self-similar curves' and they allow you to generate intricate patterns that are made with a single line. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space-filling_curve


How to use:


1) Select an object on your document and press "Pick".


->Your object will then be displayed as a clipping mask to help you preview the result.


2) Play.


3) Press "Place" to apply your artwork to the selected object.


-> The artwork will be clipped inside the object's geometry.


4) Select another object and press "Pick" to apply it as a the new clipping mask.


NOTE: For performance reasons this version is limited to a maximum of 5 iterations.


----------------------------------------------------------------

Want to support the development of free features and plugins?

You can buy me a coffee!

accepted.name: Eduardo Barbosa
accepted.description: Creative Technologist. I build tools and systems that enhance quality of life, unlock new possibilities, and empower teams and individuals.

plugins.tagline: Discover the creative potential of space-filling curves in Figma.

plugins.name: QR Fast Generator
plugins.description:
📌 QR Fast Generator

QR Fast Generator es una herramienta rápida y sencilla para generar códigos QR personalizados directamente en Figma. Con soporte para múltiples formatos, permite crear códigos QR para enlaces, contactos, redes Wi-Fi y más, optimizando tu flujo de trabajo en diseño.


Ya sea para compartir información de contacto, redirigir a un enlace o generar accesos rápidos a plataformas como WhatsApp, QR Fast Generator te permite hacerlo en segundos, con opciones de personalización de color y tamaño. 🚀


Características Principales

  1. 🔗 Múltiples Tipos de QR: Crea códigos QR para URLs, WhatsApp, contactos (vCard), redes Wi-Fi y teléfonos en segundos.
  2. 🎨 Personalización Completa: Ajusta el color del QR, el fondo y el tamaño para adaptarlo a tu diseño.
  3. ⚡ Envío Directo a Figma: Genera el QR y agrégalo al documento de Figma con un solo clic, sin salir del plugin.
  4. 📥 Descarga Rápida: Guarda el QR en tu dispositivo en formato PNG para usarlo en otros proyectos.


¿Cómo Usarlo?

  1. Selecciona el Tipo de QR: Escoge entre URL, WhatsApp, Teléfono, vCard o Wi-Fi.
  2. Introduce los Datos: Completa los campos necesarios según el tipo de QR seleccionado.
  3. Personaliza el Diseño: Ajusta el color del código, el fondo y el tamaño.
  4. Genera y Visualiza el QR: Obtén una vista previa del código QR en tiempo real.
  5. Descarga o Envíalo a Figma: Guarda la imagen en tu dispositivo o insértala directamente en Figma con un solo clic.


Mejoras y Feedback

🚀 ¿Tienes ideas para mejorar QR Fast Generator? mándame un mensajini! 😎✨
plugins.tagline: QR Fast Generator es una herramienta rápida y sencilla para generar códigos QR

plugins.name: figma-lokalise-unofficial-plugin
plugins.description:
Unofficial Lokalise Plugin.


Enhance Your Design Workflow with Our Figma Plugin for Lokalise


Our plugin bridges the gap between Figma and Lokalise, offering a seamless integration that streamlines your design localization process. With this tool at your disposal, you can:


Link Texts Between Figma and Lokalise: Easily connect text elements from your Figma designs with corresponding texts in Lokalise, ensuring consistency and accuracy across your project.


Update All Texts with One Click: Synchronize all your design texts with Lokalise in just one click. This feature ensures that all your text elements in Figma are up-to-date with the latest translations and content changes.


Switch Texts to Different Languages Instantly: Our plugin allows you to effortlessly change the language of text elements in your Figma designs. This capability is perfect for quickly adapting your designs to various language markets.


Set Individual Text Elements: Gain the flexibility to specify translations for each text element within Figma individually. This feature provides the precision needed for customizing specific parts of your design to suit different linguistic contexts.


Full demo here: https://youtu.be/VPveQklO4OE


Support me at Patreon ❤️
plugins.tagline: Bridging Design and Localization in One Click

plugins.name: Zimmar - Accessibility Compliance Checker
plugins.description:
Zimmar is a free Figma plugin that checks for accessibility compliance issues and helps you fix them.


Many designers face challenges in spotting issues like small text, poor color contrast, or improperly spaced touch targets. I wanted to build a tool that would empower designers to spot and fix these issues right within Figma.


Zimmar is designed to seamlessly integrate with Figma and provide designers with quick, actionable insights.


Here’s how it helps:


  1. Scans your design for font size, contrast, and touch target issues.
  2. Flags areas where improvements are needed based on accessibility standards like WCAG.
  3. Provides suggestions to help you fix issues and improve your designs right away.
  4. Provides accessibility compliance overview on a single selection.
  5. Generates CSV or JSON reports of detected issues for further analysis.


This plugin isn’t just about checking boxes - it’s about raising awareness and making accessibility an integral part of the design process. By addressing these issues early, I strongly believe, we can create experiences that are truly inclusive and reach a wider audience.


Your comments and feedback are appreciated!
plugins.tagline: Scan your designs for font size, contrast, and touch target issues and resolve them instantly

plugins.name: Gradient Generator
plugins.description:
Gradient Generator

This Figma plugin enables designers to effortlessly create gradient-based square patterns. Select two squares with different colors, input the number of squares you'd like generated, and the plugin will automatically produce an array of squares, each shaded with an interpolated color between the two selected hues. This tool is ideal for designing color palettes, gradient backgrounds, or visualizing color transitions in your projects.


Features:

- Color Selection: Pick two squares to use as color anchors.

- Customizable Quantity: Enter the number of gradient squares you'd like to generate.

- Automatic Placement: Squares are aligned in a row for easy visual comparison.

- Smooth Color Interpolation: Each generated square shows a seamless color transition.


Simplify your color design workflow and add gradient-based color arrays with just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin to generate gradient squares by selecting two colors and setting the quantity.

plugins.name: Consistent contacts
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to create your own data structure (text or image) and than fill the data into your frames based on matching layer and key name. You have to have the data structure in a predefined JSON format. Example:

{

"records": [

{

"photo": { "image": "avatar-01.jpg" },

"name": "John Doe",

"id": "1234",

"phone": "+1 110-1234",

"company": "TechNova Inc.",

"position": "Software Engineer",

"email": "john.doe@technova.com"

}

]

}

The JSON can be ZIPped with images to a single file, which you can drop to the plugin and populate the frames. The populated frames have to be wrapped together in a parent frame or a component instance works as well. All the frames or instances have to be selected directly to be populated correctly.


WEBP image format is not supported by Figma. JPG and PNG formats works. The whole ZIP file has to be smaller than 1MB, which is a memory limit for any plugin. The ZIP file is remembered, even if you close the plugin, but it is removed from memory and replaced by a new one, if you select a new file.


Not being a developer myself, this is my very first attempt to create a Figma plugin with a huge help from AI. I was able to make it into a working prototype, but there might still be some glitches. If the plugin does not work correctly, check the ZIP content, JSON structure and correct naming of the images. If the plugin stops to work, try to "Clear memory" via a dedicated button. It should reset everything and clean the memory of the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Fill in consistent connected data to your frames

plugins.name: Symplr.io - Figma to a working App in minutes
plugins.description:
What is Symplr.io?

Symplr.io is a cutting-edge low-code platform designed to empower anyone to create production-ready web and mobile apps effortlessly. Symplr.io allows users to rapidly compose innovative apps covering a broad range of domains such as fintech, open finance & e-commerce.


What Does This Plugin Do?

The Symplr.io - Figma to Functional App Instantly plugin bridges the gap between design and development. It enables the users to convert a Figma design into a working app by seamlessly importing the Figma design into the Symplr Studio. The users can extend the imported app by adding API workflows and business logic within Symplr Studio.


What Can You Do in Symplr.io Studio?

  1. Add Logic & APIs: Use Symplr's intuitive low-code tools to define business logic and integrate APIs, leveraging the Arazzo Workflow Specification for seamless API integrations.
  2. Build, Test, & Deploy: Build your app, test its functionality, and deploy the code directly to your GitHub repository.


How to Use the Plugin

  1. Install the Symplr.io - Figma to Functional App Instantly plugin from the Figma Marketplace.
  2. Using the plugin interface, tag your Figma components to match Symplr’s widget library.
  3. Import your tagged Figma designs to Symplr.io.
  4. View your auto-generated app.
  5. Enhance your app by adding business logic and APIs (Arazzo specification-based workflows).
  6. Build and test your mobile app directly from Symplr.io.

Note: Currently, Symplr.io supports mobile apps with React Native.


Create your next mobile app seamlessly, from design to deployment, with Symplr.io! (https://studio.symplr.io)
plugins.tagline: Instantly convert Figma designs into production-ready, mobile apps.

With this plugin, you can easily manage GUI template designs and atlases, streamlining the resource handoff process for the Defold game engine. It features a robust customization system for GUI nodes, a Slice 9 generator/editor, and various support utilities and export tools.


Atlases:


  1. Create and manage sprite atlases directly within your Figma project.
  2. Bundle or combine atlases for streamlined export.
  3. Export atlases and image resources for your Defold project with a single click.


GUI Nodes:


  1. Design Defold GUI templates as simple frames in Figma.
  2. Fully leverage Figma's design tools without any limitations from Defold's side.
  3. Edit additional GUI node properties using the custom editor.
  4. Export GUI templates as they are, or bundled with atlases and other resources.

📝 Description

Transform your text styles in seconds! The fastest way to batch update font styles in Figma with minimal effort.

- One-click batch replacement for multiple text layers

- Lightning-fast font style updates

- Real-time font preview with instant search

- Auto-detect and display mixed text styles

- Seamless dark mode support

- Clean, minimal interface for maximum efficiency


🚀 Quick Start

1. Select text layers or frames

2. Pick your font settings

3. Click update - Done!


⚠️ Notes

- Ensure target fonts are installed in Figma

- Nothing selected? → Select text layers first

plugins.description:
{
    "general": {
        "sample" :[
            "The text layer named 'general.sample' will be changed this string when '0' is selected.",
            "'1' を選択すると、'general.sample' という名称のテキスト要素がこのテキストに書き換わります。"
        ],
        "back": [
            "back",
            "戻る"
        ]
    },
    "stage_1": {
        "S_information": {
            "title": [
                "Information",
                "お知らせ"
            ]
        },
        "S_login": {
            "title": [
                "Sign in ",
                "ログイン"
            ]
        }
    }
}


How to use


  1. Specify text layer name according to the JSON hierarchy structure. (e.g. ) general.back or stage1.S_information.title
  2. Select the element you want to change.
  3. Launch plugin.
  4. Upload json file from button.
  5. If you select Language index "0",
  6. and press "Update word",
  7. then, for example, the value of text layer named "general.back" will be replaced to "back".


  • If the Target node is "Only selected Nodes", only selected elements are replaced. If "All", all elements are replaced. (The "All" option may not be able to process pages of enormous size.)
  • The language designation is an array number, so any numbers of languages can be added.
plugins.tagline: Manage multiple languages in a single json file.

plugins.name: Figma to Creatopy
plugins.description:
Boost your workflow by importing Figma designs directly into Creatopy—work faster, collaborate better, and scale effortlessly.


Key Features


  1. Quick Import:

Easily import selected Figma frames into a project and folder of your choice in Creatopy.

  1. Import as single design or set: Set import is available for multiple identical frames provided the layers have the same name and are of the same type.
  2. Smart Layer Mapping: Figma layers (images, text, shapes) are auto-converted to matching Creatopy layers.
  3. Editable Elements: All imported elements stay editable—tweak designs, animate, or scale with automation.
  4. Preserved Structure: Figma’s nested groups stay intact, keeping your design organized and easy to navigate.



Current Version Limitations


  1. Frame properties are removed; frames become groups.
  2. No support for auto layout and constraints.
  3. Limited support for blend modes, strokes, effects, gradients, and corner radius.



Streamline your process. Scale your creativity. Try “Figma to Creatopy” and design smarter from the start.
plugins.tagline: Boost your workflow by importing Figma designs directly into Creatopy.

plugins.name: Version Stack
plugins.description:
Version Stack allows you to create and manage multiple versions of selected frames in Figma with ease. Each version is automatically saved with a timestamp and arranged in a dedicated “Version Stack” page using an auto-layout for seamless tracking. Forget manual duplication—this plugin ensures that your design iterations are neatly organized and easily accessible.


How to Use:


1.Select a frame you want to save as a version.

2.Run the plugin, and click 'Save Version' . A new version with a timestamp will be saved in the “Version Stack” page.

3.Each version is stacked vertically in an auto-layout, allowing you to track the evolution of your design effortlessly.


Important Note:

The frame name must remain the same for new versions to be added to the existing version stack.


Limitations:


•Works only with Frame nodes.

•Ensure the “Version Stack” page is not renamed manually to avoid issues.


We Value Your Feedback:

We’re constantly looking to improve! If you have any suggestions, feedback, or feature requests, please share them with us. Your input will help make Version Stack even better for you and the design community. Thank you for using our plugin!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly save and manage design versions in an organized layout

plugins.name: BizTag - Name Tag Generator
plugins.description:
Automating the name tag design process


Conferences, case comps, and hackathons make up the highlights of many student's time in universities. Why? Because they combine hands-on learning, creativity, teamwork, networking, and the thrill of solving real-world challenges in a lively, collaborative environment.


If you've ever attended one of these events, you might notice that professional partners have name tags around their neck. Designing these name tags can take hours of manual work to make the layouts consistent and audit for content mistakes. But what if all that work could be done with the click of a button?


Meet BizTag


BizTag is a powerful Figma plugin that is built by a designer, for designers. The app communicates with Figma's Plugin API to build a series of clean, customizable, and organized name tags.


All it takes is a background image with a resolution of your choosing, and a .csv file populated with information on your event partners, and you can generate dozens of name tags instantly. The plugin automatically places name, company, and pronouns on the frontside, and generates a QR code to place on the backside using a QR code API.


Each frame comes with auto layout, enabling ease of customizability for the designer.


Schema


The schema is as follows:


type Partner = {
firstname: string;
lastname: string;
position: string; // Position @ Company
pronouns: string; // etc. They / Them
linkedin: string; // LinkedIn Profile URL
};

type PartnerList = Partner[];


where the .json / .csv file is taken as a single PartnerList object.
plugins.tagline: Automate your graphic design process
